Room.Name: Dragon Tooth Inn Registration Desk
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the registration desk of the Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The vestibule and main entry is to the north,while the grand ballroom is immediately to the east. You see a sweeping stairway leading to the upper floors of the inn, where a number of luxurious rooms are located. There is a dark hallway behind the desk with a sign over the door that says, "keep out."
